definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: I've obtained a Senior Bartender's Qualification Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 我获得了高级调酒师资格证书。

sentences.english: It is the first day of wine mixing class.
sentences.chinese: 今天是调酒训练班上课的第一天。

sentences.english: If a boy is to do family, do bartenders or DJ can ah.
sentences.chinese: 如果是男孩是做家教，做调酒师或者DJ都可以啊。

sentences.english: The app has also made me something of a sommelier of sounds.
sentences.chinese: 这个应用程序也有我调酒师的声音。

sentences.english: He whips that "log" of a racquet around like a swizzle-stick.
sentences.chinese: 他甩动这笨得象木头的拍子如同耍调酒的小棍。

sentences.english: There are plenty of tasty alcohol mixed drinks that are on the low calorie side.
sentences.chinese: 其实有很多美味的调酒都是低热量的。

sentences.english: It was often said that I had one of the best wine palettes.
sentences.chinese: 我常常被说成是最好的调酒师。

sentences.english: He asks the bartender for some aspirin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 他向调酒师要一些阿司匹林药片。

sentences.english: A bartender should know what to do and how to do it.
sentences.chinese: 一个调酒师应该知道做什么和怎么做。

sentences.english: The scientists turned up plenty of antioxidants, as well as a few bartending tips.
sentences.chinese: 从中科学家发现了大量的抗氧化剂和一些调酒秘诀。

sentences.english: The bartender can't believe his ears, and remains silent.
sentences.chinese: 调酒师不敢相信自己的耳朵，沉默了半晌。

sentences.english: Work as bartender and marriage counselor.
Mr. Tom has caught a cold. He asks the bartender for someaspirin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆先生患了感冒，他向调酒师要一些阿司匹林药片。

sentences.english: The flowery liqueur has become a favorite of many bartenders.
sentences.chinese: 这种芬芳的烈性酒受许多调酒师的追捧。
